p: We then performed the following three experiments using presumptive zygotes. In experiment I, presumptive zygotes were cultured in various single and sequential IVC media ( Table 1). In experiment II, zygotes were selected for culture in OM + BSA/FBS and OM + FBS ( Table 1) to investigate the effect of FBS in the early or whole period of IVC. Finally, we performed experiment III for assessment of parthenogenesis, fertilization rate, and blastocyst cell number in OM + BSA/FBS culture using Grade 1, 2, and 3 oocytes.
